pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Species Chromatogram // A simple method to display and characterise the multidimensional ecological niche of a species. The method also estimates the optimums and amplitudes along each niche dimension. Give also an estimation of the degree of niche overlapping between species. See Kleparski and Beaugrand (2022) doi:10.1002/ece3.8830 for further details.
